title: Can someone clean the ME REGION on this EFI/BIOS? For 820-3787
message:
Please, can someone clean the ME REGION on this EFI/BIOS? Please clean this bin and not just upload a clean version. This bin is original to this Logic Board I am working on. The reason I need CLEAN ME is I just replaced the PCH/Intel Graphics because it was cracked. Now the system boots but hangs because of the ME REGION I am sure. Logic Board is an 820-3787 2.3GHZ 16GB w/ Dedicated 2Gb GPU. 

[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pKdzvPrt-yrMHx1xa7i3fgIZESvaEGiW/view?usp=sharing[/url]

Thanks in advance!

title: Can someone clean the ME REGION on this EFI/BIOS? For 820-3787
message:
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1jng2B8TZG0ySwSJ0RnJg_QGHsu7NNmpl[/url]

Clean ME
PRAM cleared
Fsys checksum fixed as serial was messed with.

title: Can someone clean the ME REGION on this EFI/BIOS? For 820-3787
message:
Thanks but now the system doesn't boot. I tried it two times, the system only spins the fan for 5 seconds and then restarts. I installed the original bin and it turns back on but hangs on the Apple Logo so I know my soldering and loading the bin is good. 

Can you please retry and only clean the ME? My original file I sent boots but with the revision, it doesn't boot now. 

Thanks again in advance!

title: Can someone clean the ME REGION on this EFI/BIOS? For 820-3787
message:
Try this file as is.
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1TiQAXEFpoDdoG5UwlT-WfHpudY_ajVBB[/url]
If good, serial can be fixed after...
